text: phraxngkh thrng prathan nalng ma cak fak fa læw lana tang «k hil pi tam priman khxng man krasæna di phad pha xea fxng lxy xyu henux na læa cak sing thi phwk khea hlxm lng pi nı fi pheux hwang tha kheruxngpradab hrux kheruxng chı ca mi fxng chen kan nı tha nxng nan xallxhˌ thrng yk tawxyang khwam cring læa khwam thec sahrab fxng nan k ca xxk pi pen sing helux den swn thi pen prayochn kæ mnusʹy k khngca xyu nı phændin nı thanxng nan xallxhˌ thrng yk xuthahrn thanghlay
